ikigai.description: Ikigai (Áîü„ÅçÁî≤Êñê) is a Japanese concept meaning 'reason for being'. It sits at the intersection of what you love, what you're good at, what the world needs, and what you can be paid for.

paid.title: What You Can Be Paid For

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: Activities you love AND are good at

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: What you love AND the world needs

profession.title: Profession
profession.description: What you're good at AND can be paid for

vocation.title: Vocation
vocation.description: What the world needs AND pays for

valueToMotivation.ALT: Making a positive impact on others' lives
valueToMotivation.AUT: Having freedom and independence in your work
valueToMotivation.TRA: Working within established systems and structures
valueToMotivation.INN: Creating new solutions and continuous learning

locationSensitivity.high: Consider universities anywhere - global options open
locationSensitivity.mid: Balance between reach schools and closer options

socialAtmosphere.mid: Flexible - can thrive in various environments
socialAtmosphere.low: Consider programs with independent study options

financialReality.high: Factor in ROI, scholarships, and earning potential
financialReality.low: Can prioritize passion over financial return

executionCapacity.mid: Solid foundation, room to strengthen application
executionCapacity.low: Focus on building skills before applying to reaches
